definition: the prettiest girl in the school (see also 校草[xiao4 cao3])/school beauty queen/campus belle/prom queen
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Ann used to be a campus belle. Many boys were crazy about her.
sentences.chinese: 安曾是校花，令無數男孩子爲她着迷。

sentences.english: When father was young, he was hot on the school beauty in his university.
sentences.chinese: 年輕的時候，父親曾經迷戀學校的校花。

sentences.english: She is called, and with reason, the most beautiful girl in our college.
sentences.chinese: 她無可爭議地被稱之爲我們學校的“校花”。

sentences.english: WHAT exactly does it take for a young woman to be considered a "campus flower?"
sentences.chinese: 究竟怎樣的女孩纔會被稱之爲“校花”？

sentences.english: Mary and Jim are "high school sweethearts".
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗和吉姆是大學的校花。

definition: the most handsome boy in the school (see also 校花[xiao4 hua1])
the prettiest girl in the class
the most handsome boy in the class
"Ms Perfect" (i.e. fair-skinned, rich and beautiful) (Internet slang)
to be in the same class/to be in the same squad/classmate
